00041 #include "DODSDataHandlerInterface.h"

00043 typedef bool (*p_request_handler)(DODSDataHandlerInterface &);
00044 
00070 class DODSRequestHandler {
00071 private:
00072     map< string, p_request_handler > _handler_list ;
00073     string                      _name ;
00074 public:
00075                                 DODSRequestHandler( string name )
00076                                     : _name( name ) {}
00077     virtual                     ~DODSRequestHandler(void) {}
00078 
00079     typedef map< string, p_request_handler >::const_iterator Handler_citer ;
00080     typedef map< string, p_request_handler >::iterator Handler_iter ;
00081 
00082     virtual string              get_name( ) { return _name ; }
00083 
00084     virtual bool                add_handler( string handler_name,
00085                                             p_request_handler handler_method ) ;
00086     virtual bool                remove_handler( string handler_name ) ;
00087     virtual p_request_handler   find_handler( string handler_name ) ;
00088 
00089     virtual string              get_handler_names() ;
00090 };
